title.rendered: Sharjah International Airport (SHJ) UAE Contact Details

content.rendered:
Sharjah Airport Address

Sharjah International Airport P.O.Box 8, Sharjah, UAE

Sharjah Airport Contact Number

Telephone: +971 6 5581111

Fax: 00971 6 558 0355

Email: care@sharjahairport.ae

IATA Code: SHJ

ICAO Code: OMSJ

Website:  https://www.sharjahairport.ae/en/business/corporate-information/about-us/

View Location of Sharjah International airport on google maps: https://www.google.co.in/maps?biw=1366&bih=613&q=sharjah+international+airport&bav=on.2,or.&um=1&ie=UTF-8&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjRodTnkL3SAhVKFZQKHSrvC7sQ_AUIBigB

Rich in history and culture; a land with a wealth of values, warm and friendly people, all year-round sunshine and distinctive blend of glorious past and bright present, the emirate is an attractive and safe destination offering the right ingredients for leisure and business alike.

Facilities and Services At Sharjah International Airport (SHJ)

  • Banking services
  • Prayer room
  • Wi-Fi
  • Smoking places
  • Telecommunications services
  • Family facilities
  • VAT refund
  • Medical services
  • VIP service
  • Lost and Found
  • Hala services
  • Special need services
  • Restaurants
  • Transit hotel
  • Free market
  • Airport lounges
  • Shops

Baggage / Lost and Found contact at Sharjah International Airport, UAE

Baggage ServicesLost and Found Services
Baggage Services  Location: Arrivals Building

Email: baggageservices@sharjahaviation.com

Phone: +9716 514 1235  |  +9716 514 1236 | +9716 514 1288

For any baggage details, please follow the below link
https://www.sharjahairport.ae/ar/traveller/airport-facilities-2/plan-your-trip/baggage-policy/

Lost & Found location: Arrival Terminal, Phone: 00971 6 514 1235  |  00971 6 514 1236 | 00971 6 514 1288   Email: baggageservices@sharjahaviation.com

Wheelchair Services – Sharjah International Airport

Wheelchairs are available free of charge for passengers travelling to and from Sharjah Airport. For any information regarding wheelchair services, please contact

Tel: 00971 6 514 1150, or visit the Hala Services office in the main building near the Departures gate.

Car Rental contact phone number, Email – Sharjah International Airport (SHJ)

Location: Inside Arrival Buildings

Budget Rent a CarHertzSixtMaximum Rent A CarDollar Rent A CarEuropCarThrifty Car RentalAvisAutolease Rent A CarSayara Limousinr & Car RentalEmirates Rent A CarArizona Star Rent A Car
Budget Rent a Car: Phone: 00971 6 558 0366  Fax: 00971 6 558 0466 Email: Shjapt1@Budget-Uae.Com Website: Budget-Uae.Com
 Hertz:  Phone: 00971 6 552 8290 Mobile: 00971 56 603 0644 Email: Hertz.Shjairport@Alfuttaim.Ae Website: Hertzuae.Com
Sixt:  Phone: 00971 6 558 0310 Email: Airport.Sharjah@Sixt-Uae.Ae
 Maximum Rent A Car:  Phone: 00971 6 550 1515 Fax: 00971 6 550 1516
Email: Maximum@Eim.Ae
Website: Maximumcarrentals.Com
 Dollar Rent A Car:  Phone: 00971 6 336 5065 Fax: 00971 6 558 0261
Website:  Dollaruae.Com
 EuropCar:  Phone: 00971 6 558 1322 Fax: 00971 6 558 1662
Email: Europshj@Emirates.Net.Ae
Website: Europcardubai.Com
 Thrifty Car Rental:  Phone: 00971 6 558 1946 | 00971 6 558 0106 Website: Thriftyuae.Com
 Avis:  Phone: 00971 6 559 5925 | 00971 6 558 0655
Email: Shjapt@Avisuae.Ae
Website: Avis.Ae
 Autolease rent a car:  Phone: 00971 6 558 1112 Fax: 00971 6 558 1113
Email: Lathif@Autolease-Uae.Com
 Sayara Limousinr & Car Rental:  Phone: 600 522 200 Email: Info@Sayararental.Com Website: Sayararental.Com
 Emirates Rent A Car:  Phone: 8006006 Website: Et.Gov.Ae
 Arizona Star Rent A Car:  Phone: 00971 4 283 3341
Mobile: 00971 50 145 4888 Email: Info@Arizoonagroup.Ae

Taxis Services at Sharjah airport

To Leave Sharjah Airport
Location: Arrival Building
Fee: An additional fee of 20 dirhams for airport departures

To Arrive Sharjah Airport
For Taxis, please call: 600 525 252
Website: www.shjtaxi.ae
For booking taxi, please follow the link: https://services.srta.gov.ae/complaintsystem/TaxiBooking.aspx
